title: The Emperor’s Daughter
description: The Emperor’s daughter, Chunhwa, is caught between her family duties and finding her own path in the world.
quote: I would never dishonor myself by marrying you.
altHero: Katherine Huang as Chunhwa, dressed in traditional Chinese clothing
alt1: Chunhwa facing down the tip of a sword
alt2: man holds sword to Chunhwa’s neck
alt4: man reaching out in pain from the ground
